# Module: tf.keras.wrappers.scikit_learn

Wrapper for using the Scikit-Learn API with Keras models.

### Aliases:

* Module <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/wrappers/scikit_learn"><code>tf.compat.v1.keras.wrappers.scikit_learn</code></a>
